Literature.Title: Structural and Biochemical Characterization of Three Antimicrobial Peptides from Capsicum annuum L. var. annuum Leaves for Anti-Candida Use.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (36.84%) toCaerulein precursor-related fragment EaGRAVY: -0.25; mol Wt: 3519.09; mol formula: C146H240N42O46S5; mol ex coeff: 3230.Activity: treated at 200 ug/ml (56.8 uM), changed viability of C. albicans and C. buinensis.Toxicity: weak hemolysis at 200 ug/ml.
